name: Media
description: Settings for memory cards and recording media

settings.name: Select Rec. Media
settings.description: Selects which memory card slot to use for recording

settings.name: Rec. Media Settings
settings.description: Advanced settings for recording to memory cards

settings.name: Recording Media
settings.description: Sets which memory card slot to use for recording by default

settings.name: Recording Mode
settings.description: Sets how to record images to the two memory card slots

settings.name: Auto Switch Media
settings.description: When the memory card in use becomes full, recording automatically switches to the other memory card

settings.name: Display Media Info.
settings.description: Shows the recordable time for movies and the number of recordable still images on the memory card
